column4: Ok, Im trying to install an eggdrop. When I do ./configure, I get the error "C compiler cannot create executables"

sudo apt-get install build-essential?
2006-11-18T13:05:00.000Z	PF|Linux		sudo apt-get install build-essential"  ???
I got a crapload of results
you probably want tcl8.4.  Run 'apt-cache show tcl8.4'
you might want to check what version of Tcl is required
rm with the -r option. be careful ;)
